reviews.review_msg: By far the best teacher I have come across. It is such a pleasure to be in his class. He makes the environment extremely fun to learn in, and he truly cares about seeing everyone succeed! I would 100% recommend taking his class.

Took BUS 303 with Shafik this semester. Grading criteria is unclear. He is arrogant and egotistical and does not hide it one bit. He always drifts off to random subjects, which is useless for students. So many examples taught in class were no use for studying. People recommend Shafik, but take it with anyone else, it's not a hard subject.
There are easier professors for this class.. for the sake of yourself, avoid him.
